provider.name: Novita AI
provider.description: Novita AI is an AI Cloud Platform that provides Model APIs.

models.title: Chat Completions
models.description: Portkey supports all OpenAI compiant chat completions API for Novita AI models

notSupported.promptPlayground: Prompt playground is not supported for Novita AI models

integrationViaVirtualKey.description: Integrate Novita AI using Portkey's virtual key system

inline.text: Get your API key from Novita AI and add it to Portkey to create a virtual key.
inline.description: You can get your Novita AI API key from the Novita AI website [here](https://novita.ai/docs/get-started/quickstart.html#_2-manage-api-key).

portkeyPythonSDK.description: Initialize Portkey with the virtual key in Python
portkeyPythonSDK.codeExample: sample python SDK code for microsoft/wizardlm-2-7b chat completions call on Novita AI using virtual key

portkeyNodeSDK.description: Initialize Portkey with the virtual key in Node.js
portkeyNodeSDK.codeExample: sample node.js SDK code for microsoft/wizardlm-2-7b chat completions call on Novita AI using virtual key
